name: Zaned-AquiferDrill
title: Zaned - Drill to Aquifer
author: Align - updated by Dr.INZANE
description: Original Description: Adds a drill that draws up water from the underground.  Dr,INZANE's Changes: I made it compatible with version 1.0.0 or higher of Factorio and I increased water production from 75 to 750 per operation.  8 of these drills are equivalent to 5 offshore pumps.  Perhaps later I will add configurable amounts of water production.
